html:
2026-0152
2026-02-24FINBank of Canada ActRe-appointment of a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of CanadaApproval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Finance of Greg Stewart of Regina, Saskatchewan, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on February 28, 2029, effective March 1, 2026.N/A
subject: Re-appointment of a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada
precis: Approval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Finance of Greg Stewart of Regina, Saskatchewan, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on February 28, 2029, effective March 1, 2026.
